Articles.Content:
If you just want to practice orbiting, this is the easiest and simplest way.

You can escape easily with it, but you wont be breaking any speed records since it's just 1 small Liquid rocket.

I have gotten 4800m/s with it after escaping, that was very far away though, gravity had almost no effect.

Ration the thrust while your in the atmosphere, you'll waste it overcoming gravity and resistance. Wait until you get high and you'll have plenty for maneuvering

Very stable too.

http://mod.gib.me/kerbal/mods/

You'll need to extract the XL fuel tank, located under the SynthOrange directory, into your parts folder
can you place the mod link too? or we won't be able to run your ship
Heh i feel like cheating when i use this fuel tank. So much fuel. This tank should weight a LOT to compensate the capacity

Heh i feel like cheating when i use this fuel tank. So much fuel. This tank should weight a LOT to compensate the capacity

Yeah...

you should change the weight to 12.5 in the cfg. because it has 5 times the capacity of the stock tank
This has been made and uploaded already, so neener.

This has been made and uploaded already, so neener.

Yes, it has been done already...

But I don't think this count's as elegant simplicity... simple cheating?
